This is kinda just a trivia that will probably not make it to the English translation so imma just talk about here: The title of the chapter is 曲がり角でのできごど which means something like "incidents at the street corner." The word used here for street corner can also be used to mean  "turning point" as in a "point where things start to change (usually for the worse). Coincidentally, on the last scene we see Karin take a turn around a corner where Kise was waiting for him. This is very indicative that the story has began to take a different direction from here. It was a very artistic touch by author that's why I really didn't mind the cliffhanger here.
@DrinksandDame thank you, I dare say your summaries are actually improving and they were already excellent.

Those drinks are sus, the chefs definitely putting cum in them lol. At the moment  I'm sure karin is loyal but there's going to be a lot of misunderstandings going forward from here on in, probably from both sides. I also think all the suspects are going to start making their moves now but who will cheat first is still anyone's guess.
fumitsuki sou and azuse's art and story is the best!

Itaiamai Summary here: https://pastebin.com/fWSyF3d2   While I do understand the feeling ya'll get that all we have is just a kiss and nothing indicative of where the story will actually go despite waiting for 2 months (the author just released full volumes of Rarefure during that time and it really sold well btw), we can all just read something else while waiting, right? So personally, it's not that big of a disappointment for me. As long as there're more chapters to come, I can deal with the cliffhangers.
dude... 2 months for this? ffs. hopefully we get the next chapter in vol. 84.
Bruh I've waited 2 months for yet another cliff hanger lol. 2 months for a kiss haha
